Summary: i was behind my grand parents house. blue skies about 2pm. it came from the going south.it was the size of silver dollar on end.lasted about 45sec to minute.
divs: Sighting Detailstalking to my uncle. it was shinning from the sun. a flying saucer.it was as if it was on end.we just watched it moving from north to south. it disappeared behind some trees. there were no markings on it, completly silver.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dolton
This sighting has never been favorited.
